dc_title_s: Thacker's reduced survey map of India
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale 1:4,435,200. 1 in. = 70 English miles. Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. Insets: Bombay -- Calcutta -- Madras -- Delhi -- [Nicobar Islands] -- [Sea routes to India]. (C) John Bartholomew & Son Ltd. Dimensions: 1 map : color ; 99 x 85 cm, on sheet 107 x 90 cm.
dc_publisher_s: Thacker, Spink & Co : W. Thacker & Co (Calcutta and London)
